## Bug Information

**Location**: `path/to/file.ext:line`

**Severity**: 
<!-- Check ONE box -->
- [ ] Critical - Page-breaking, security vulnerability, data loss
- [ ] High - Significant impact on functionality or security
- [ ] Medium - Code quality, performance, consistency issues
- [ ] Low - Minor issues, warnings, documentation

**Type**:
<!-- Check ONE box -->
- [ ] Bug - Something doesn't work correctly
- [ ] Feature - Missing functionality
- [ ] Enhancement - Improvement to existing code
